column4: Hi. I've a problem with usb devices (usb memorie, usb HD, usb bluetooth): when I insert a usb device with gutsy started, the devices doesn'ty work. If I restart the system, they works. But if I unplug and after I plug again the devices, they doesn't works... help!!! sorry for my poor english
maybe hal is daiying for some reason? check if it's running 'ps ax | grep hal'
so it seems that hal is not the problem...
